title: Peter D Smits
text:
Peter Smits is the Principal Applied Scientist at Truveta.


PhD Evolutionary Biology | 2017 | University of Chicago | Chicago, IL
MSc Biological Sciences | 2012 | Monash University | Melbourne, Victoria, Australia
BS Biology: Ecology and Evolution | 2010 | University of Washington | Seattle, WA



Principal Applied Scientist | Truveta | 2022 - Present
Senior Applied Scientist | Truveta | 2021 - 2022
Data Scientist II | Amazon (Advertising) | 2020 - 2021
Postdoctoral Scholar | University of California – Berkeley | 2017-2019
Graduate Researcher | University of Chicago | 2012-2017
